summary: carlos tevez has been told to terminate his contract with juventus to complete a return to his former club boca juniors in argentina . the former manchester city striker 's deal with the serie a champions does not expire until the end of next season but he has reportedly told the club he wishes to leave this summer . boca have confirmed they are close to completing a deal for the 31 - year - old , but club president daniel angelici has stressed that tevez must terminate his contract with the italians first .
